original:
In tissue engineering, physiological relevance refers to the extent to which in vitro living tissue constructs exhibit morphological and functional similarities to native tissues. This concept is crucial for the development of effective tissue-engineered products that can be utilized in clinical applications.

Bioengineering strategies are employed to enhance the mechanical properties of scaffolds and to functionalize materials with gro
